Class FilterTypeEnumProperties | Methods | Constants
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.api
Classpublic class FilterTypeEnum
InheritanceFilterTypeEnum AbstractEnum

Specifies which categories of videos you would like returned. Valid filter values are PLAYABLE, UNSCHEDULED, INACTIVE, and DELETED.
